title: Where's DJ Sona?
body: I thought she was going to be released initially with the patch? I just see the skin set to "unavailable".

replies.body: The patch notes just say she'll be released in 5.4. It could be 5 minutes from now, it could be 5 days from now, it could be 5 minutes before 5.5 goes live.
This is something I've been trying to help players understand. Thank you.
It probably won't be out for a couple more hours. The update was supposed to take around 6
